name: Estimated Reading Time
body:
### About Estimated Reading Time Joomla Plugin
This Joomla! plugin will show the estimated reading time of your articles just below the title. The plugin will show the estimated reading time in the article detail view as well as in frontpage or article list views.


### Installation
This plugin is installed as a regular Joomla Plugin, so just grab the installation package and put it into your Joomla! Extension installer and click install.

### Usage
After installing the plugin go to the plugin manager in your Joomla! site and click on the plugin name for configuring it.

You can configure following settings:

**Excluded Categories.** Use this to specify categories which articles will not show Estimated Reading Time.

**Use Default Styling.** With this setting you can specify if you want to use default styling or specify your custom style below.

**Custom Styling.** Here you can add your custom css for the article reading time text. Text here will be included in a _style_ HTML property of the container tag.

### Demo
We currently have no demo site for this, but you can see in action in the [blog of ManualesJoomla.es](http://manualesjoomla.es/es/blog) where we show the plugin with some customizations. Even a language override!!

If you just want to say thank you or want to share something with me, please contact me at carlos@hepta.es .
